page.title: 07Transport in Crediton
page.content: A number of{buses}come into Crediton each day. Most of the buses belong to a firm from Exeter called Devon General, but some belong to other firms like Mid-Devon and Bow Belle, which do tours as well. There is a bus going into Crediton every hour during the day. There are also two{taxi}services. There is a{railway}station at Fordton,which is just outside Crediton. It isn't in a very good place for a station but it has to be there because the railway follows the Yeo valley. Not many trains stop there for passengers. Most of the people that go on the trains go to Exeter or Barnstaple. Most people in Crediton have a{car.
